Nominee: Condoleezza Rice, of California, to be Secretary of State, vice Colin Luther Powell, resigned.
actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held and concluded. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 109-151. {
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Lugar, Committee on Foreign Relations, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 4. Subject to nominee's commitment to respond to requests to appear and testify before any duly constituted committee of the Senate.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate set for January 25 and 26. Vote scheduled for January 26, 2005.
Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85
